mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.rating, r.content, r.is_deleted AS isDeleted, r.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, r.spot_id AS spotId, DATE_FORMAT(r.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, r.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.spot_id = #{spotId} AND r.is_deleted = 'F' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.id, r.rating, r.content, r.is_deleted AS isDeleted, r.user_id AS userId, r.spot_id AS spotId, DATE_FORMAT(r.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, r.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE u.email = #{username} AND r.is_deleted = 'F' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
SELECT id, rating, content, is_deleted AS isDeleted, user_id AS userId, spot_id AS spotId FROM reviews WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'F'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews ( rating, content, is_deleted, user_id, spot_id ) VALUES ( #{rating}, #{content}, 'F', #{userId}, #{spotId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET is_deleted = 'T' WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'F'
